Field Detail

file

private java.io.File file
Constructor Detail

FileResource

public FileResource(ScriptLoader loader,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.io.File file)
             throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                    ResourceException
Constructs a new resource from a File object. The version tag is based on the last modification time of the file.

Parameters:
loader - the loader that loaded this resource
name - the name of this resource
file - the File of this resource
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException - if there was a problem creating the url
ResourceException - if the file could not be read
